properties.areaDesc: Moriches Inlet NY to Montauk Point NY out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 9 at 3:18AM EST until January 9 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 4 to 7 feet.

* WHERE...Moriches Inlet NY to Montauk Point NY out 20 nm.

* WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
